user_stories.title: User Registration
user_stories.description: As a new user, I want to create an account with email and password so that I can start using the task management application
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email and password on registration form
System validates email format and password strength
User receives confirmation email after successful registration
User account is created in the database
User is redirected to login page after registration

user_stories.title: User Authentication
user_stories.description: As a registered user, I want to log in with my credentials so that I can access my personal task dashboard
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email and password on login form
System validates credentials against database
Successful login redirects to user dashboard
Invalid credentials show appropriate error message
User session is maintained across page refreshes

user_stories.title: Task Creation
user_stories.description: As a logged-in user, I want to create new tasks with title and description so that I can track my work items
acceptance_criteria: User can access task creation form from dashboard
User can enter task title (required field)
User can enter task description (optional field)
User can set due date and priority level
Task is saved to database and appears in task list
Form validation prevents empty titles

user_stories.title: Task List View
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see all my tasks in a organized list so that I can review and manage my workload
acceptance_criteria: User sees list of all their tasks on dashboard
Tasks display title, due date, priority, and status
Tasks can be filtered by status (complete/incomplete)
Tasks can be sorted by due date or priority
User can mark tasks as complete/incomplete from list view

user_stories.title: Project Organization
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to organize my tasks into projects so that I can group related work items together
acceptance_criteria: User can create new projects with name and description
User can assign tasks to specific projects
User can view tasks filtered by project
Projects appear as separate sections in the dashboard
User can edit project details and delete empty projects

user_stories.title: Team Collaboration
user_stories.description: As a project owner, I want to invite team members to collaborate on projects so that we can work together on shared tasks
acceptance_criteria: Project owner can invite users by email address
Invited users receive email invitation with accept/decline options
Team members can view and edit shared project tasks
Task assignments can be made to specific team members
Team members receive notifications for task updates

user_stories.title: Real-time Notifications
user_stories.description: As a team member, I want to receive real-time notifications about task updates so that I stay informed about project progress
acceptance_criteria: Users receive browser notifications for task assignments
Users see in-app notifications for task comments and updates
Notification preferences can be configured by user
Notifications include task title and update description
Users can mark notifications as read/unread

user_stories.title: Calendar Integration
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my task due dates to sync with my Google Calendar so that I can see deadlines alongside my other appointments
acceptance_criteria: User can connect their Google Calendar account
Task due dates automatically create calendar events
Calendar events update when task due dates change
User can choose which projects sync to calendar
Integration works bidirectionally (calendar to tasks)
